prompt: Design a location picker page with a bold, high-contrast look featuring a white background and red accents. Include a prominent app bar with a red back arrow and the title 'Choose Your Location' in bold red. Place a search bar at the top with a red search icon, placeholder text 'Search for a place' in light gray, and a thick red border. Add a 'Use Current Location' option with a red GPS icon and text, styled as a bold card with a shadow. Display recent locations in a vertical list with red pin icons, location names in bold black, and addresses in gray, each in a white card with a red border. Place a full-width 'Confirm' button at the bottom in red with a strong shadow. Use Material Design with bold typography, high contrast, and a dynamic, energetic aesthetic.
